post_detail.description:
Going to PromaxBDA?  Click 3x proudly presents this year's official conference app, filled with maps, speaker information, session schedules, and ample social integration through Facebook and Twitter.  Download the Free App Today!
        
Results:
Approximately 1,000 downloads
Users spent 425 hours inside the app itself
16,860 sessions opened
post_detail.title: Promax App
